trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were 2 other sightings in Las Vegas on or around June 5th 2003
divs: sighting detailsi was standing out in my back yard and i heard a helicopter noise so i looked up and not even 3o feet above the roof of my house i saw 2 blacked out helicopters no lights no descreptive features made noise right behind them was a triangle craft i looked up as it passed directly over me it was like a stealth bomber but had lights under it at first i thought it was spot lights but they didnt project all the way to the ground lit up under side of craft only the lights were only white and there was 4 of them once the ufo passed over me 1 more blacked out helicopter was trailing it and same thing as the first 2 it was blacked out it was coming from the sw and heading towrds red rock canyon area . the next day my a\c was broken in my house . i allways told myself in my head it was just the military but after i researched online today about visitations in lasvegas and read about all the triangles i knew it was something more and maybe has personaly affected my life
Summary: i was outside saw 2 black helicopters then ufo then one more black heli next day my a/c wasnt working inmy house ufo passed over my roof/
